code: import api from'./api';export const newsService={getAll:async()=>{return await api.get('/admin/news');},getById:async id=>{return await api.get("/admin/news/".concat(id));},create:async data=>{return await api.post('/admin/news',data);},update:async(id,data)=>{return await api.put("/admin/news/".concat(id),data);},delete:async id=>{return await api.delete("/admin/news/".concat(id));},uploadImage:async(newsId,file)=>{const formData=new FormData();formData.append('file',file);return await api.post("/files/news/".concat(newsId,"/upload-image"),formData,{headers:{'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}});},deleteFile:async fileId=>{return await api.delete("/files/".concat(fileId));}};
